testcase.name: Successfull fund transfer between accounts
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on parabank Registration page..........................passed When user enter the valid firstName "rakesh"................................passed And user enter the valid lastName "chir"....................................passed And user enter the valid address "hyd"......................................passed And user enter the valid city "hyd".........................................passed And user enter the valid state "telangana"..................................passed And user enter the valid zipCode "500072"...................................passed And user enter the valid phoneNumber "798982"...............................passed And user enter the valid ssNumber "3454"....................................passed And user enter the valid username1 "Rakesh313"..............................passed And user enter the valid password1 "Password123"............................passed And user enter the valid confirmPassword "Password123"......................passed And user clicks on registerButton...........................................passed When user clicks on transfer funds from the menu............................passed Then user should be redirected to the fund transfer page....................passed When user select the following accounts to fund transfer 0 and 0............passed And user enter the amount "25"..............................................passed And clicks on the transfer button...........................................passed Then user verify the transfer amount as a confirmation message is displayed.passed When user clicks on account overview........................................passed And user clicks on receiver account number..................................passed Then user should see the transfered listed in the account details...........passed
